ch0245_42_mary/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Look at you, arrivin’ right on time!
ch0245_42_mary/0101_0701_02_10:
But I still beat you here, and I’ll beat you
again tomorrow!
ch0245_42_mary/7101_0701_01_10: I’m excited about school, no doubt about it.
ch0245_42_mary/7101_0701_02_10:
But I’m a little nervous about keepin’ up with
classes...
ch0245_42_mary/7101_0701_03_10: There’s no way I’m givin’ up, though!
ch0245_42_mary/7101_0701_04_10:
When I decide to do somethin’, I fully commit to it
and give it my all!
ch0245_42_mary/7102_0701_01_10:
Everyone on Pasio gave me all sorts of ideas
about how to style my school uniform.
ch0245_42_mary/7102_0701_02_10:
In the end, I chose a style you don’t often see
in Galar. It’s a nice change!
ch0245_42_mary/7103_0701_01_10:
When I was battlin’ at school, somebody asked if
they could be my apprentice.
ch0245_42_mary/7103_0701_02_10:
Social status don’t mean a thing in battle!
So I wouldn’t even know what to do with an
apprentice.
ch0245_42_mary/7104_0701_01_10:
Schools are always buzzin’ with energy—so lively
and full of fun!
ch0245_42_mary/7104_0701_02_10:
Maybe havin’ a big school in Spikemuth could
give the place a boost?
ch0245_42_mary/7105_0701_01_10:
If I’m gonna study at school, I reckon it’s fair to
want a few good marks, don’t y’think?
ch0245_42_mary/7105_0701_02_10:
There’s no way I’m lettin’ you or anyone else beat
me in class. I’m goin’ straight to the top!
ch0245_42_mary/1701_0701_01_10: Here’s a little somethin’ to cheer you on!
ch0245_42_mary/1701_0702_01_10:
I can keep goin’ because of you...so no need to
thank me. Got it?
ch0245_42_mary/2501_0701_01_10: Ridin’ Cyclizar always seems to boost my mood.
ch0245_42_mary/2501_0701_02_10:
So I might come across a bit more aggressive
than usual...
ch0245_42_mary/2501_0701_03_10: Huh? You think I looked cool?
ch0245_42_mary/2501_0701_04_10: Hehehe... You’re gonna make me blush.
ch0245_42_mary/2501_0702_01_10:
It’s no fun just standin’ there watchin’! Why don’t
you take Cyclizar for a spin?
ch0245_42_mary/2501_0702_02_10: I’d love to see you ridin’ around on Cyclizar!
ch0245_42_mary/2511_0701_01_10:
School is great, but I want it to be more than just
havin’ fun.
ch0245_42_mary/2511_0701_02_10:
I want to use what I’ve learned to help everyone,
including the people back in Spikemuth.
ch0245_42_mary/2511_0701_03_10: There’s still so much I gotta learn!
ch0245_42_mary/2511_0702_01_10:
Gyms are kinda like schools that teach you about
Pokémon battling.
ch0245_42_mary/2511_0702_02_10:
Did you know there’s even a Gym that also
operates as a school?
ch0245_42_mary/3001_0701_01_10:
*yawn* Oh man... Wish I could just crawl back
into bed right now...
ch0245_42_mary/3003_0701_01_10:
I really love this outfit, but it does get a bit hot
when the sun’s out. S’ppose it’s not quite right for
a day like today, is it?
ch0245_42_mary/3005_0701_01_10:
Y’know, I think about Spikemuth whenever it gets
dark out. Wonder how the lot of ’em are doin’
back home.
